      • analysisStart

        public static void analysisStart(short analysisMethodId,
                                 byte orderingId)
        Announce start of an analysis transmission with total ordering (among several threads) under the same orderingId
        Parameters:
        analysisMethodId - remote analysis method id
        orderingId - analyses with the same orderingId are guaranteed to be ordered. Only non-negative values are valid.
